title: Make Add Manga dialog internally scrollable with always-reachable actions

requirements.summary: Constrain the Add Manga dialog height to the viewport and ensure the form body scrolls inside the dialog so action buttons are always reachable and clickable on small screens.
acceptanceCriteria: When the Add Manga dialog is open and the viewport height is small (e.g., ~700px or less), the dialog does not extend beyond the visible screen area.
The dialog body (fields such as Alternate Titles, Synopsis, Genres, Cover Images, Notes) can be scrolled to reach all inputs.

The “Cancel” and “Add Manga” buttons remain visible at the bottom of the dialog (sticky or fixed within the dialog) OR are always reachable via scrolling within the dialog, with no need to scroll the page behind the modal.
The scroll behavior works with mouse wheel/trackpad and touch scrolling on mobile.
No UI element overlays or blocks clicks on the “Cancel” and “Add Manga” buttons (buttons remain reliably clickable).

file_operations.description: Adjust dialog composition and layout classes (without modifying any files under frontend/src/components/ui) to (1) enforce a viewport-based max height using modern viewport units (e.g., 100dvh) and (2) ensure the form body becomes the only scroll container via flex + min-h-0 + overflow-y-auto/overscroll-contain. Keep the footer actions pinned within the dialog (e.g., non-scrolling footer with proper z-index/background or sticky within the dialog container) so “Cancel” and “Add Manga” are always reachable and reliably clickable on short laptop and mobile viewports.

requirements.summary: Add a lightweight in-repo manual regression checklist for verifying Add Manga dialog max-height and internal scrolling so the bottom actions never become hidden again.
acceptanceCriteria: A documented manual test checklist exists in-repo (or equivalent lightweight test note) describing how to verify the Add Manga dialog scroll and action button accessibility at small viewport heights.
Running through the checklist confirms the “Add Manga” button can always be reached and clicked.

file_operations.description: Create a short manual regression checklist covering: testing at small viewport heights (e.g., ~700px and common mobile sizes), verifying the dialog stays within the viewport, verifying the dialog body scrolls (mouse wheel + touch), confirming the page behind the modal does not scroll, and confirming “Cancel” and “Add Manga” are always reachable and clickable with no overlays blocking interaction.
